mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT type_id as listId, type_name as listName FROM WUHAN_DATA."ANALYSIS_THEME" WHERE is_show = 0 OR is_show = 9 ORDER BY type_weight DESC
SELECT theme_id as themeId, theme_name as themeName, type_name as listName, is_show as isShow FROM WUHAN_DATA."ANALYSIS_THEME" WHERE type_id = #{type_id} AND (is_show = 0 OR is_show = 9)

SELECT plate_id as plateId, a.theme_id as themeId, b.theme_name as themeName, plate_name as plateName, show_type as showType, show_term as showTerm, a.is_show as isShow FROM WUHAN_DATA."ANALYSIS_PLATE" a INNER JOIN WUHAN_DATA."ANALYSIS_THEME" b ON a.theme_id=b.theme_id WHERE a.theme_id = #{themeId} AND a.is_show = 0 ORDER BY plate_id ASC

SELECT indi_id as indiId, plate_id as plateId, search_indi_id as indiCode, indi_new_name as indiName, show_type as showType, show_color as showColor, indi_weight as indiWeight, is_show as isShow FROM WUHAN_DATA."ANALYSIS_INDI" WHERE plate_i = #{plateId} AND is_show = 0 ORDER BY indi_weight DESC
SELECT DISTINCT INDICATOR_GRP21_ITEM_NAME as freqName FROM PLATFORM1."SRIT_DTA_INDICATOR_TJ" WHERE INDEXDATAID = #{indiCode}
SELECT DATA_TIME_NAME as time FROM PLATFORM1."SRIT_DTA_INDICATOR_TJ" WHERE INDEXDATAID = #{indiCode} AND INDICATOR_GRP21_ITEM_NAME = #{freqName} ORDER BY DATA_TIME_NAME DESC LIMIT 0, #{showTerm}

SELECT INDEXDATAID as indiCode, INDICATOR_GRP21_ITEM_NAME as freqName, DATA_TIME_NAME as time, INDICATOR_GRP22_ITEM_NAME as timePoint, VALUE as indiValue, UNIT_NAME as unitName FROM PLATFORM1."SRIT_DTA_INDICATOR_TJ" WHERE INDEXDATAID = #{indiCode} AND INDICATOR_GRP21_ITEM_NAME = #{freqName} AND DATA_TIME_NAME >= #{startTime} AND DATA_TIME_NAME <= #{endTime} ORDER BY DATA_TIME_NAME DESC
